item.title: CVE-2022-29421|2024-09-16T18:59:39.262Z -- adam%20skaat -- countdown%20%26%20clock%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Adam Skaat's Countdown & Clock plugin on WordPress via &ycd_type vulnerable parameter.
